mapper.select: select t.transition_id, t.wh_id, t.order_type, t.order_biz_type, t.pickup_type, t.work_mode, t.from_area_id, (select area_name from bas_area ba where ba.area_id = t.from_area_id) as from_area_name, t.target_area_id, (select area_name from bas_area ba where ba.area_id = t.target_area_id) as target_area_name, t.carriy_mode, t.create_at, t.update_at, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = t.create_by), t.create_by) create_by, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = t.update_by), t.update_by) update_by from bas_area_transition t where t.wh_id = #{wh_id} order by t.create_by desc
